body.para: VS2008 lets you develop using WPF.
Infer from that what you will.
Now, back to the original question please (and its good form to start a new thread if the subject is quite different from the OP! :) )

quote.quotepara: thanks for that very meaningful answer... I'll assume the minimum requirements is the same as what Vista requires and that WPF requires Vista. All I can do is read the marketing material and I don't even want to do that.
